description._content: Catalog #: 09_01625 Title: First Lieutenant Harry Haw Special Collection Photo Grand Canyon Arizona Additional Information: View of Cutiss Condor twin motor aircraft flying over the Grand Canyon, Arizona. Handwritten inscription ""First formation flight by the army over Grand Canyon"", Harry Haw served in the U.S. Army in the 514th Observation Squadron. He entered the U.S. Army in 1917 and became a First Lieutenant in 1930. He became a civilian Transport Pilot by 1930 and had logged 789 flying hours by 1934. he later became Principal of the Alice Birney school.
